document_data.name: Jeklpa Vine
document_data.mainbody: '''Jeklpa vine''' was a plant that grew in the jungles of [[Chult]].
document_data.Description: These thorny vines could grow up and around structures.

Ecology.Uses: The [[Kuro]] [[goblin]]s of Chult were known to have jeklpa vines growing on the fences of their [[slave]] pens to prevent their captives from escaping.
